# canStartPictureInPictureAutomaticallyFromInline

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value that indicates whether Picture in Picture starts automatically when transitioning to the background when the view controller presents its content inline.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var canStartPictureInPictureAutomaticallyFromInline: Bool { get set }
```

## Configuring Picture in Picture

- **allowsPictureInPicturePlayback**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the player allows Picture in Picture playback.
